title: [K-12] Classroom Management Strategy Development Through Analysis of Pre-Service Teachers' Discipline Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of Basic Teacher Training Programs and Classroom Management Experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service elementary mathematics teachers to reflectively analyze disciplinary experiences and explore alternative classroom management strategies

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can analyze how classroom power structures influence student-teacher relationships
One can critically evaluate disciplinary mechanisms (surveillance, classification, evaluation, rituals) and propose their application in educational contexts
One can design and simulate nonviolent classroom management strategies reflecting cultural sensitivity
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
